Unless you're super rich, you don't want a picture of monkey for $20k. 

The most important thing in NFT is the team and the utility, not the art. Think about it.

MEKAVERSE and others did super cool designs before the reveal. And because the artwork is the most important thing, people were paying around $20k for NFT. And after the reveal, the whole thing just went down. Because the art is nice, but without another utility it's useless.

The most important thing in NFT is art = BULLSHIT
Most influencers tell you that you have to like the art. So if the value drops to zero, you have a nice picture. But I think it's utter bullshit that people fell for and cost them an awful lot of money. Projects like HAPE,
